programme.title: Lazy Mans Wife
programme.desc: Udoka is forced to love Amobi because of his ill gotten wealth, but things are about to go wrong as Ikenna will do everything to marry.

programme.title: Pains Of Yesterday
programme.desc: Prince Uche falls in love with two sisters, Ezinne and Chidinma unknowingly, this started a war between the sisters that will leave hearts broken.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Chief Ekurukaralu is determined to become the Isi Nze at any cost, even if it means committing numerous atrocities in the land. His actions sparks outrage amongst his kinsmen.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: Africa Magic brings you entertainment and compelling stories that speak to the African heart loved by Africa. Watch intriguing stories on AM Epic.

programme.title: Save My Body
programme.desc: Ebube is employed by his friends to sleep with Annabel, he leaves his fiancee in the village and takes the offer. This decision is about to uncover a can of worms.

programme.title: Seduced By Fate
programme.desc: Chioma allow Uzor, her ex to stay in her fiancees house, this is about to take a turn that will leave Uzor stunned.

programme.title: Dark Man
programme.desc: Leo spends years in poverty, now rich and wealthy after pledging his life and soul to the devil. He will do everything to stay rich.

programme.title: Desperate Mother
programme.desc: Emeka who is broke and poor will stop at nothing to keep his woman Adanna, but Adannas mother will stop at nothing to make Adanna marry someone rich.

programme.title: The Beast In Me
programme.desc: After Chief Ikenga and the elders murder Chizarams father over a land dispute, they awaken a vengeful force. Fortified by grief and rage, Chizaram is ready to make them pay.

programme.title: Agony Of A Healer
programme.desc: Mkpurumma is gifted the powers of healing by a witch, but she must not receive anything in return when she heals anyone.

programme.title: Scarlet
programme.desc: Scarlet, broken by her past choose a life she is proud of, but her loved ones are not. Everything is about to change as she meets Kunle.

programme.title: Broken Secret
programme.desc: Kenechukwu leaves his wife Ijeoma for ten years without looking back. She gets tempted and slept with her ex, Ugochukwu, the same week her husband surprises her and comes back.

programme.title: Akudo
programme.desc: Akudo does everything for Ikenta because his wife Mmachi decides to be a lazy woman.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: A love story that transcends boundaries. A young teenage couple, who found a once in a lifetime kind of love, have to fight against all odds to stay together.

programme.title: When Love Is Mad
programme.desc: Akudo is in love with David who gets into a competition with his friend about who gets Akudo and he gets mad in the process. But love conquers all.

programme.title: Double Face

programme.title: Eyes On The Throne
programme.desc: Two prominent members of a community fights for the vacant throne, kidnapping and threatening each others family, while their children fall in love. Will that bring peace?

programme.desc: After 40 years of marriage, Joe wakes up one morning, shoots his wife, flees to Florida and embraces his fugitive life. But his love of karaoke gets him caught.

programme.title: A Killer Among Friends
programme.desc: Best friends take a girls trip before applying to grad school. When one of them doesnt make it home, everyone wonders what happened in Vegas?

programme.title: Ruby and Jodi: A Cult Of Sin And...
programme.sub-title: Ruby and Jodi: A Cult Of Sin And Influence. Truth And Distortion
programme.desc: Jessi Hildebrandt exposes their aunt Jodis manipulation as survivors speak out and reveal her cult-like control and the lasting damage she causes.

programme.title: Ruby and Jodi: A Cult Of Sin And...
programme.sub-title: Ruby and Jodi: A Cult Of Sin And Influence. Honest, Responsible, Humble
programme.desc: Ruby Frankes journals expose abuse under Jodi Hildebrandts influence. The court delivers justice, but questions remain - is her control truly over?

programme.title: Deadliest Families
programme.desc: A mother-of-two vanishes from her home in Utah in 2009. As police investigate, dark family secrets emerge, and a tragedy follows that no one saw coming.

programme.title: Abundant Life
programme.desc: Terradez Ministries has a firm belief in the supernatural power of God with a mandate to empower believers in the promises of God. Why live a normal life when you can live the Abundant Life.

programme.title: The Bible Discovery TV Show
programme.desc: Hosted by the Hembree family, the daily show provides tons of theological insight and heartfelt discussion on your daily Bible reading.

programme.title: Kellie
programme.desc: Join Kellie Copeland and special guests as they discuss topics to help us reach the other side and live a victory life.

programme.title: Rally TV
programme.desc: Rally TV with Rick and Nettie Reyna is focused on helping our audience take their faith to the next level. We believe that if God can do it for us, He can do it for you!

programme.title: No More Curse
programme.desc: The curse of sin met its death at the Cross of Christ. Join Tracy Harris as he unpacks this truth to see miracles of wholeness and destinies restored in the Kingdom.

programme.title: Jesus the Healer with Nancy Dufresne
programme.desc: Jesus mind was tormented on the Cross so we could be free. Nancy Dufresne teaches how to keep our thoughts under control for a sound mind.

programme.title: Faith Today
programme.desc: Join Dr Andre and Jenny as they share exciting news and interview guests from all around the world.

programme.title: Planetshakers TV
programme.desc: A television program birthed out of the desire to empower generations to win generations. Join Pastors Russell and Sam Evans each week as they bring an encouraging and uplifting Bible based message.

programme.title: Prophetic Encounter - Jacques vd...

programme.title: Shaun Of The Dead
programme.desc: Hot Fuzz stars Simon Pegg and Nick Frost make the ultimate zombie adventure comedy. A man decides to turn his mundane life around during a zombie apocalypse.

programme.title: Dejà Vu
programme.desc: Dejà vu unexpectedly guides an ATF agent through an investigation into a shattering crime.

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: A rescue pilot and his estranged wife embark on a treacherous journey to save their daughter after a catastrophic earthquake.

programme.title: Absolute Deception
programme.desc: Cuba Gooding Jr stars in this action film. A widowed reporter seeks the help of a federal agent to investigate her husbands secrets, but they soon become targets.

programme.title: Spotlight
programme.desc: Spotlighting remarkable actors, we revisit their careers and movies in a fast-paced, entertaining way, followed by in-depth discussions on their hits!

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: A gangster that everyone believed to be dead mysteriously reappears to avenge himself upon his former boss and find his missing son.

programme.title: Hero Mode
programme.desc: A teenage coding genius has just 30 days to create the worlds greatest video game or his family loses everything. No pressure.

programme.title: Deadlock
programme.desc: An ex-military man must prevent disaster when rogue soldiers seize a Georgia power plant and take hostages.

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: Epic tale of survival and betrayal inspired by true events thats set in Americas uncharted wilderness.

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL, now a cook, is the only person who can stop a gang of terrorists when they seize control of a US Navy battleship.

programme.title: Happy Feet
programme.desc: In the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soulmates through song, lives a penguin who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge Of The Fallen
programme.desc: Megatron is back seeking revenge and with more Decepticon reinforcements on the way, the Autobots may have more to deal with than meets the eye.

programme.title: Guns Akimbo
programme.desc: A guy relies on his newly-acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.

programme.title: Snakes On A Plane
programme.desc: When hundreds of venomous snakes invade an ill-fated trans-Pacific flight, Neville Flynn thwarts the twisted scheme of a deadly assassin.

programme.title: Daylight
programme.desc: Kit Latura, a disgraced emergency services worker, is given his chance at redemption when a New York City commuter tunnel begins to collapse.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Jordan Peeles opera prima follows an African-American who meets his white girlfriends family and soon learns the sinister reason why he was invited.

programme.title: Paradise City
programme.desc: Ryan Swan must carve his way through the Hawaiian crime world to wreak vengeance on the kingpin who murdered his father.

programme.title: Highlander
programme.desc: The year is 1536 and a Scottish clansman is mortally wounded in battle by a terrifying warrior.

programme.title: Buffaloed
programme.desc: Set in the underworld of debt-collecting and follows the homegrown hustler Peg Dahl, who will do anything to escape Buffalo, NY.

programme.title: Red Heat
programme.desc: A tough, disciplined Russian policeman teams up with an unpredictable, wise-cracking Chicago detective to capture a Russian criminal in the US.

programme.title: Sudden Death
programme.desc: Darren McCord, a fireman with a troubled past, engages in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a ruthless adversary when her daughter is taken hostage.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: A gang of bank robbers pulls off their heists while masked as former US presidents. An agent is sent undercover to investigate the group, who are part of the towns surfing culture.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europes Most Wanted
programme.desc: A star-studded voice cast, loads of action, superb visuals and plenty of gags ensure the third attempt by the animals to return to NYC is a win.

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: Caesar and his apes are pitted against an army of humans in an epic battle that will determine the fate of both their species...and the future of the planet.

programme.title: Hulk
programme.desc: Oscar-winning director Ang Lee and Eric Bana bring Marvel Comics most destructive superhero to life in this captivating film that shows the origins of the big green monster.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Its all bigger and fiercer than ever as Kick-Ass and Hit-Girl return for another action-filled romp. This time the stakes are higher as revenge and death are in the air.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: Nick OBannons premonition of a deadly car race spares his life and those of a few lucky others around him. But Death wont take no for an answer.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling Collision
programme.desc: AEWs newest show Collision will deliver more of what fans and viewers tell us they want - athleticism, big personalities, exciting storylines and hard-hitting wrestling action.
